title: Drink Moment Delivery Menu | 104 Washington Place New York - DoorDash
description: Get delivery or takeout from Drink Moment at 104 Washington Place in New York. Order online and track your order live. No delivery fee on your first order!
cleaned_text: Drink Moment Newly Added| DashPass| Juice Bar, Healthy|$$ Temporarily closed on DoorDash My name is Aisha, and I'm the founder of Moment. I enjoy cooking and experimenting with new recipes. I used to work in a business environment. Interminable meetings. To dos. Notifications.
